metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10183 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Virt-install(1) utility used to provision new virtual machines hasintroduced an option '--unattended' to create VMs without user interaction.This option accepts guest VM password as command line arguments, thusleaking them to others users on the system via process listing. It wasintroduced recently in the virt-manager v2.2.0 release.

criterions.comment: virt-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
